name: 梦回 Dream back
description:
Menghui is an open-world sandbox development game. There are many krypton-blasting gameplays in this game, in order to ensure absolute people-friendliness,
You are welcome to complain, and this treasure hereby promises to do its best to repair it. Welcome everyone, please enjoy it.
Official game exchange group: 619641228
The game is in the pre-test stage. If you find a problem to be fixed, you can join the feedback exchange group above, or directly feedback in the game. After receiving the feedback, we will deal with it first and give a satisfactory answer.
Friends who are interested in the game can also enter the official game exchange group and participate in internal testing.
